answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
In researching your question, I've yet to come across an RFP with your request. I have attached a  RFP  seeking similar  court related work. I hope this can serve as a start.

author: Unknown
text: Can anyone tell me if they have written an RFP for municipal attorney services that has split out municipal court related work from TIF, Development, Contract/Agreement services etc?  We are trying to decide if this is a way we could save our city money.  Has anyone else thought of doing this or doing it currently?
title: RFP's for Attorney Services
